author: deephoto
title: Specialites are useful
review:
The fact that I still use it proves the quality of it. Anyway it can be easily reproduced with some farmer and strings... :) I am wondering why LEGO don't have a new one around?

It is fun, because you can spread it totally wide open, so you can sit on it, and play, and after you finished, you just grab the strings and with one move you close it creating a good sack.
